Who is Solomon?

I am a Full-Stack Developer based in Irvine, California



To support my degree, I taught children how to code with OpenWorld Learning (OWL). During OWL's 20 years, thousands of children from Title 1 Schools found independence, built skills, and had fun.

From 2015 - 2018, our students inspired many of us become programmers. We held monthly coding sessions, built demos, and studied teaching standards to educate our students. Over many hours, our students overcame mental blocks to become problem solvers. As OWL ceased operations, I took a chance on myself and tried a different life path.

This decision resulted in a 2 year coding journey, ~730 cups of tea, life-changing mentorship, and new friends. Today, I write clean code, persist to solve problems, and learn through my projects. After work, you can find me staying active, singing with Voices of Reason, practicing voiceover, illustrating, or writing.
